charges.charge_description: 18:1951 and 2 -- Aiding and Abbeting Robbery. (Indictment Filed 02/05/04)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Sentenced to a total term of 365 months, consisting of 240 months on Count 1, 84 months on Count 2, to run consecutive to Count 1, and 41 months on Count 4, to run consecutive to Counts 1 and 2. Term of 3 years supervised release w/special conditions, all to run concurrently. $300.00 assessment imposed; Restitution in the amount of $176.88

charges.charge_description: 18:1951 and 2 -- Aiding and Abbeting Robbery. (Indictment Filed 02/05/04)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Sentenced to 123 months imprisonment; This term consists of 63 months each on Counts 1 &; 5, to run concurrently; and 60 months on Count 3, to run consecutive to counts 1 &; 5.
